page.title: 06Warsash
page.content: Warsash is situated at the mouth of the{River Hamble}.It is a well known centre of boating activities.In 1944 it was the departure point for the {Normandy Invasion}.A memorial was erected on the shore for those who lost their lives in the days that followed. Since then,the town has become better known for its peacetime activities. It has a large marina and several boatyards.The town itself is a busy community,with many interesting places to visit. The{School of Navigation}has been an important centre for Naval training for many years.The{Victory {Hall}is the third community building to stand on the site.The Warsash{clock {tower}provides a panoramic view of the surrounding area.
